trans-unit.source: Represents a data-binding converter to handle the visibility of repeat buttons in scrolling menus.
trans-unit.target: 스크롤 메뉴에서 반복 단추의 표시 여부를 처리하는 데이터 바인딩 변환기를 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter> determines whether a menu should display the repeat buttons when a menu has too many items to fit on the screen at once.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter> 메뉴는 메뉴에 너무 많은 항목을 한 번에 화면에 맞게 때 반복 단추를 표시할 것인지 여부를 결정 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the converter with a <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> that has four bindings.
trans-unit.target: 변환기를 사용 하 여 한 <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding> 하는 네 개의 바인딩이 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: The four bindings should be to properties of the parent <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>: If the menu items are organized vertically (which is the default for menus), bind to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 부모 속성에 대 한 4 개의 바인딩 이어야 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>: 메뉴 항목은 구성 된 세로 (즉, 메뉴에 대 한 기본값) 하는 경우 바인딩할 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedVerticalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.VerticalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentHeight%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportHeight%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: If the menu items are organized horizontally, bind to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 메뉴 항목 가로로 구성 하는 경우 바인딩할 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ComputedHorizontalScrollBarVisibility%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.HorizontalOffset%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ExtentWidth%2A>, 및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer.ViewportWidth%2A>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Set <xref:System.Windows.Data.MultiBinding.ConverterParameter%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> to 0 or 100.
The value is treated as a percentage and determines whether a button is hidden when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the given location.
trans-unit.target: 값 백분율로 처리 되 고 단추를 숨길지 여부를 결정 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 지정된 된 위치에 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the top, the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is 0% and the top button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 위쪽의 위치는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 은 0% 및 위쪽 단추는 숨겨집니다.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is at the bottom, the position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> is 100% and the bottom button is hidden.
trans-unit.target: 때는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 의 위치 아래에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 100% 및 아래쪽 단추는 숨겨집니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter> in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> for a menu.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter> 에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ControlTemplate> 의 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> 메뉴에 대 한 합니다.

trans-unit.source: For the complete example, see [Styling with ControlTemplates Sample](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=160041).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.MenuScrollingVisibilityConverter" /> class.
Values produced by the source binding.
Type of the target.
Type that the source will be converted into.
Converter parameter.
Culture information.
Called when moving a value from a source to a target.
Converted value.
<xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> may be returned to indicate that the converter produced no value and that the default value should be used.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.DependencyProperty.UnsetValue> 값 변환기에서 생성 하 고 기본값을 사용 해야 함을 나타내기 위해 반환 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing> may be returned to indicate that the binding should not transfer the value or use the default value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Data.Binding.DoNothing> 바인딩 값을 전송 하거나 기본값을 사용 하지 해야 나타내기 위해 반환 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
This parameter is not used.
This parameter is not used.
This parameter is not used.
Not supported.
